name: Record Time
description:
Made for the 2019 GMTK Jam, quite fun to challenge yourself to beat in the minimum amount of shots and/or time. You have "only one" room where you must navigate different puzzles with "only one" vinyl. Enjoy...

Controls: 

Left Mouse - shoot

Right Mouse - pick up vinyl/press buttons

R - restart current level

Escape - go back to main menu

WASD - move

Song used is "Dispersion Relation" by Kevin MacLeod.

Voice lines graciously provided by Veloci.
